name: Chicx Makes History!
description:
(Submit your speedrun video & I will put the fastest person below)

FASTEST SPEEEDRUN: N/A yet

You play as Chicx, a ambitious asteroid determined to pull off an impressive feat & make a name for himself. After being ridiculed by all of the bigger asteroids in the asteroid belt, Chicx sets out of a quest to make one of the largest impacts in history.

Chicx makes history is a short experience, originally designed to be played by thousands of people via a live stream chat, & since they were able to beat it using the stream, the single player mode is released here.
